name: Hiroshi Tanaka

He is motivated to arrange home modifications for elderly living based on his understanding of the importance of comfort and safety in living environments, especially after witnessing changes in his own family's needs. With a rational decision-making style and moderate adaptability, Hiroshi seeks to implement thoughtful solutions that enhance quality of life while being mindful of potential risks.
